resources.string:
1. Basics of the game
 
 The main objective of the game is to flip all cards except for bombs
 When all cards except bombs are flipped in a row or column, a point is scored
 The point is multiplied by the level number (e.g. 2 points for level 2)
 There are 6 lives at the beginning of the game
 When a bomb is flipped, a life is deducted
 When the entire grid is cleared, the game advances to the next level
 Each increase in level will add a row and column to the grid, from 5x5 to 9x9
 The game is over when there are no lives remaining

2. Clues
 
 Each card can have a value of 1, 2, 3 or a bomb 💣
 Black numbers show the total of card values in that row or column
 Grey numbers show the number of bombs in that row or column
